content: अनुजीव् {c1c} <ab>P.</ab> {@--1@} To depend upon for subsistence, hang on, live by or upon (something); ये च त्वामनुजीवंति नाहं तेषां न ते मम <ls>Rām.</ls>; स तु तस्याः पाणिग्राहकमनुजीविष्यति <ls>Dk. 122</ls> hang or depend on, live (submissively) under, live as a subordinate to. {@--2@} To see without envy; यां तां श्रियमसूयामः पुरा दृष्ट्वा युधिष्ठिरे अद्य तामनुजीवामः <ls>Mb.</ls> {@--3@} To live for any one. {@--4@} To follow or imitate in living; <ls>R. 19. 15</ls> {%<ab>v. l.</ab>%} {@--5@} To survive.
